# Mercenaries
# Known variants # "Punks"
# "Punk gang leader"
# Missions objectives ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]punk gang leader[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain amount of [color=#a4885c]cybersun dataminers[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
